flawed_nl_solution:
Tim has 152 photos - 100 photos = <<152-100=54>>54 photos.
When Tim has 54 photos, then Paul has 54 + 10 photos = <<54+10=64>>64 photos.
Tim and Paul have together 54 photos + 64 photos = <<54+64=118>>118 photos.
That leaves Tom with 152 photos - 118 photos = <<152-118=34>>34 photos.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 52, not 54. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
